      • transfer

        public EthereumTransactionResponse transfer(EthereumTokenTransferRequest request,
                                            TransactionConfig txConfig)
                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Transfer the balance from token owner's account to `to` account - Owner's account must have sufficient balance to transfer - 0 value transfers are allowed
        Parameters:
        request - The data of the transaction (owner, receiver, amount of tokens (in weis) and the address/alias of the contract)
        txConfig - Configuration of how the transaction will be send to the network
        Returns:
        The result of the request
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • transferFrom

        public EthereumTransactionResponse transferFrom(EthereumTokenTransferFromRequest request,
                                                TransactionConfig txConfig)
                                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Transfer `tokens` from the `sender` account to the `to` account The calling account must already have sufficient tokens approved for spending from the `sender` account and - Sender account must have sufficient balance to transfer - Spender must have sufficient allowance to transfer - 0 value transfers are allowed
        Parameters:
        request - The data of the transaction (approved spender's address, token sender's address, receiver, amount of tokens (in weis) and the address/alias of the contract)
        txConfig - Configuration of how the transaction will be send to the network
        Returns:
        The result of the request
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
